author: Rita Mae Brown
message: Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts. And never hope more than you work.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lululemon
message: Your outlook on life is a direct reflection on how much you like yourself.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lao Tzu
message: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
title: Thought of the day

author: Kin Hubbard
message: You won't skid if you stay in a rut.
title: Thought of the day
